physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building that is gated with a tower. Long grasses can be seen outside of the fences. The background of the photograph shows the roofed part of the building. A utility pole can be seen outside of the fences.
title_text: Changi Jail Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Changi POW Camp (Changi, Singapore)
